title: Welcome to Orient
body: Orient is a JS library for easily creating in-situ guided tours, help systems and onboarding flows. You're currently seeing the first slide of an Orient Flow!
onShow: console.log('Runs when the first slide is shown')

title: Easy to Create Flows
body: Define flows in simple external JSON files or even an API endpoint. Flows are made up of multiple slides, just like this one.

title: A multitude of applications
body: Orient is designed to be incredibly easy to integrate into projects, no matter what technology you're using.

title: Onboard new users with ease
body: Give your new users a smooth onboarding experience with interactive, in-situ messaging.

title: Integrate with your help system
body: Reduce customer support requests by implementing guided help with Orient.

title: Advanced Options
body: Hook into internal Orient events and run custom Javascript when a flow or even an individual slide begins or ends.

title: Flexible & Custom Styling
body: Choose from a number of styles including modals, in-situ floats, sidebars and completely custom styling. Mix and match different styles of slides.
